title: Becton , Dickinson , and Company 's employees from 2011 to 2018
summary: Becton Dickinson employment was around 19,500 workers as of 2018 .
Becton Dickinson company goals are to create solutions to food safety and access , clean water , clean air and fuel , health care , and sustainable living .
Becton Company Overview Becton is one of the world Dickinson leading chemicals , plastics and refining companies globally .
